alert.note: Alert for Camden; Gloucester; Northwestern Burlington (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 23 at 7:55PM EDT until September 24 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...The tidal Delaware River and its tidal tributaries. * WHEN...Until midnight. * IMPACTS...At this level, widespread roadway flooding occurs in coastal and bayside communities and along inland tidal waterways. Many roads become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional rounds of minor tidal flooding are possible into the new week. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Delaware River at Philadelphia MLLW Categories - Minor 8.2 ft, Moderate 9.2 ft, Major 10.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 23/09 PM 8.6 1.9 1.8 Minor 24/09 AM 7.3 0.6 1.8 None 24/10 PM 8.3 1.6 1.3 Minor 25/11 AM 6.9 0.2 1.0 None 25/11 PM 8.0 1.3 0.9 None 26/12 PM 7.6 0.9 1.4 None Delaware River at Burlington MLLW Categories - Minor 9.3 ft, Moderate 10.3 ft, Major 11.3 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 2.6 ft, Major 3.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 23/09 PM 9.7 2.0 1.8 Minor 24/10 AM 7.8 0.1 1.3 None 24/10 PM 9.1 1.4 1.3 None 25/11 AM 7.6 -0.1 0.8 None 26/12 AM 8.9 1.2 0.8 None 26/12 PM 8.5 0.8 1.2 None &&
